values.name: RequestSecurityIdentityForTheSpecificationProvided
values.comment: Request Security identity for the specifications provided (name of the security is not supplied)

values.name: RequestListSecurities
values.comment: Request List Securities (can be qualified with Symbol, SecurityType, TradingSessionID, SecurityExchange. If provided then only list Securities for the specific type.) ( Deprecated in FIX 5.0 SP1 )
